title: Exploring the Weird Alien World of The Eternal Cylinder | Hidden Gems
description:
Each week KC and Jesse check out an overlooked game on Steam and decide whether or not it's a "Hidden Gem". This week they're checking out Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun.
